葽字的基本解释

葽
yāo
古书上说的一种草。
（草）茂盛：“丰草葽，女罗施。”

葽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yāo］
［《廣韻》於霄切，平宵，影。］
［《廣韻》於堯切，平蕭，影。］
［《廣韻》於笑切，去笑，影。］
(1)草名。
(2)草盛貌。

葽字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　葽； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1047第04
【唐韻】於霄切【正韻】伊堯切，?音腰。【詩·豳風】四月秀葽。【傳】葽，葽草也。【箋】物成自秀葽始。【詩·緝曰】四月陽氣極于上而微隂已胎于下，葽感之而早秀。毛註不指爲何草，鄭疑爲王萯，《說文》引劉向說：苦葽也。　又草盛貌。【前漢·禮樂志】豐草葽，女蘿施。　又【集韻】伊鳥切，音杳。【爾雅·釋草】葽繞，棘蒬。【註】今遠志也。　又【廣韻】於笑切，音要。亦草盛貌。

葽字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
葽字的起名意思

古书上说的一种草。（草）茂盛。

lush
Basic explanation of words
lush
yāo
A kind of grass said in ancient books.
(Grass) Lush: "Feng Caoqi, female Luo Shi."
lush
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yāo］
["Guang Yun" cuts in Xiao Xiao, flat night, shadow. ]
["Guangyun" Yu Yaoqie, Pingxiao, Shadow. ]
["Guangyun" cuts with laughter, laughs, and shadows. ]
(1) Cursive name.
(2) The grass is full of appearance.
lush
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　葽; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1047 04
【Tang Yun】Yu Xiao cut 【Zheng Yun】Yiyao cut, sound waist. 【Poetry·Binfeng】April Xiufeng. [Biography] 葽, 葽草 also. 【Jian】While things come into being from Xiufeng. [Poetry·Jiyue] In April, the yang qi is at the top and the slight yin is at the bottom. Mao's note does not refer to why the grass, Zheng suspects Wang Xu, and "Suo Wen" quotes Liu Xiang as saying: Ku Jia Ye.　The grass is beautiful. 【Former Han·Liyuezhi】Feng Caoqi, female Luo Shi.　[Jiyun] Yi bird cut, sound depressed. 【Erya·Shucao】Round, spiny. [Note] Jinyuanzhi also.　[Guang Yun] Yu Xiaoqie, the sound is important. The grass is also beautiful.
lush

Old glyph
lush
Name meaning
A kind of grass said in ancient books. (Grass) flourishes.
yāo
1) тладианта сомнительная (Thladiantha dubia Roem.)
2) истод тонколистный (Polygala tenuifolia Willd.)
3) густой, сочный (о траве)
丰草葽 густы богатые травы
